short_name.description: Short name or other type of identifier.

cross_street.description: Cross street or landmark where the station is located.

region_id.description: Identifier of the region where the station is located.

post_code.description: Postal code where station is located.

rental_methods.description: Payment methods accepted at this station.

is_virtual_station.description: Is this station a location with or without physical infrastructure? (added in v2.1-RC)

station_area.description: A multipolygon that describes the area of a virtual station (added in v2.1-RC).

capacity.description: Number of total docking points installed at this station, both available and unavailable.

vehicle_capacity.description: An object where each key is a vehicle_type_id and the value is a number presenting the total number of vehicles of this type that can park within the station_area (added in v2.1-RC).

is_valet_station.description: Are valet services provided at this station? (added in v2.1-RC)

rental_uris.description: Contains rental uris for Android, iOS, and web in the android, ios, and web fields (added in v1.1).

android.description: URI that can be passed to an Android app with an intent (added in v1.1).

ios.description: URI that can be used on iOS to launch the rental app for this station (added in v1.1).

web.description: URL that can be used by a web browser to show more information about renting a vehicle at this station (added in v1.1).

vehicle_type_capacity.description: An object where each key is a vehicle_type_id and the value is a number representing the total docking points installed at this station for each vehicle type (added in v2.1-RC).

station_status.description: The current status of a station and all the bikes that are currently there.

num_bikes_available.description: Number of vehicles of any type physically available for rental at the station.

vehicles_types_available.description: Array of objects displaying the total number of each vehicle type at the station (added in v2.1-RC).

vehicle_type_id.description: The vehicle_type_id of vehicle at the station (added in v2.1-RC).

count.description: A number representing the total amount of this vehicle type at the station (added in v2.1-RC).

num_bikes_disabled.description: Number of disabled vehicles of any type at the station.

num_docks_available.description: Number of functional docks physically at the station.

num_docks_disabled.description: Number of empty but disabled docks at the station.

is_installed.description: Is the station currently on the street?

is_renting.description: Is the station currently renting vehicles?

is_returning.description: Is the station accepting vehicle returns?

last_reported.description: The last time this station reported its status to the operator's backend in POSIX time.

vehicle_docks_available.description: Object displaying available docks by vehicle type (added in v2.1-RC).

vehicle_type_ids.description: An array of strings where each string represents a vehicle_type_id that is able to use a particular type of dock at the station (added in v2.1-RC).

count.description: A number representing the total number of available docks for the defined vehicle type (added in v2.1-RC).

vehicles.description: Array of objects containing data about a specific vehicle that is present at the docking station (added in v2.1-RC).

bike_id.description: Rotated identifier of a vehicle (added in v2.1-RC).

is_reserved.description: Is the vehicle currently reserved for someone else? (added in v2.1-RC)

is_disabled.description: Is the vehicle currently disabled (broken)? (added in v2.1-RC)

vehicle_type_id.description: The vehicle_type_id of this vehicle as described in vehicle_types.json (added in v2.1-RC).

current_range_meters.description: The furthest distance in meters that the vehicle can travel without recharging or refueling with the vehicle's current charge or fuel (added in v2.1-RC).
